newsitem.title: USA: Fed adds reserves via overnight system RPs.
newsitem.headline: Fed adds reserves via overnight system RPs.

text.p: The Federal Reserve added reserves into the banking system via a round of overnight system repurchase agreements Thursday, a New York Fed spokeswoman said.
At 1130 EST/1630 GMT, the time the Fed usually intervenes in the market, federal funds were at 5-5/16 percent, above the central bank's Fed's 5-1/4 percent target.
The move was mostly in line with expectations.
Some said a coupon pass is possible later this session.
